Infografis
Kredit Mandiri Tumbuh Double Digit Pada Kuartal III-2019
01 Nov 2019, 06:46 by Uji Sukma Medianti
Jakarta - Pertumbuhan kredit konsolidasi yang mencapai 11,5% ini dibarengi dengan rasio NPL gross yang turun 2,53% secara year on year (yoy).


Foto: Dok Mandiri


(ujm/hns)
text:
Infographics
Mandiri Credit Grows Double Digits in Quarter III-2019
01 Nov 2019, 06:46 by Sukma Medianti Test
Jakarta - The consolidated credit growth which reached 11.5% was accompanied by a gross NPL ratio which fell 2.53% year on year (yoy).


Photo: Doc Mandiri


(test / hns)
